mindless728.FluidFlow
Class ChangedBlocks

java.lang.Object
  mindless728.FluidFlow.ChangedBlocks

public class ChangedBlocks
extends java.lang.Object

Keeps track of the list of changed blocks to keep order and a mapping from the blocks to the new changed types for fast access

          default constructor
